Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: CRAIG REYNOLDS
Reviews.Content: rugged phone but not loud enough for me,maybe the phone was defective?.otherwise great product,battery life great and overall quality excellent

Reviews.Title: It's very good
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Téllez
Reviews.Content: Excelent phone very rugged!, CAT german quality was very good, german way better than korean and american technology in everything!, even in cars!

Reviews.Title: broke down in a glass of cola
Reviews.Author: Vasilenko Dmitry
Reviews.Content: Buttons broke down in a glass of Coca Cola. Do not Buy It. I can not fix and return it.
